GET /api.description: Serves a JSON representation of the available endpoints of the API

GET /api/topics.description: Serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: Serves an array of all topics. Can be sorted by 'sort_by', ordered ASC or DESC with 'order', and filtered by 'topic'

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: Serves the specified article object with its comment count

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Updates the vote counter on the specified article and returns the updated article object

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Serves an array of all comments associated with the specified article

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Adds a comment to the list associated with the specified article

DELETE /api/comments/comment_id.description: Deletes the specified comment from the database
